title: I got hit by a Morgana snare at lvl 1
body: My team voted /remake because I was tagged as afk.

replies.body:

Thanks, a new channel to subscribe to. His intro and outro are really annoying, though, made me press esc to check my lolclient multiple times haha. Guess I got used to it by now, though.
lol I do that soooo often.  Catch the enemy mid laner _just_ under tower for a cheap kill.
the fun part is that garen takes no damage..
But despite the /remake, you couldn't leave the game for the next three days anyway.
I could leave the game. But I was still snared in the next one. Inb4 account ban.

I knew Revive wasn't really gone! They just changed the icon... And the name.

Eh what? Was that an old summoner spell? 

_Looks up on LoL Wiki_

Ooooh, well they do kinda look similar... I wouldn't know about it, joining during S6 preseason.

ty dfg
Destiny's such fucking bullshit. The cooldown is too short for what it does. That ability might as well be an ult.

they killed me about 3 days later out of mercy.
